service.title: The 'application/zlib' and 'application/gzip' Media Types
service.documentation: This document defines the 'application/gzip' and 'application/zlib' media types for compressed data using the gzip and zlib compression formats.

media-type.documentation: The 'application/zlib' media type describes a block of data that is compressed using zlib compression. The data is a stream of bytes as described in RFC 1950.
The 'application/gzip' media type describes a block of data that is compressed using gzip compression. The data is a stream of bytes as described in RFC 1952.
